Functions

void DAC_Init (LPC_DAC_TypeDef *DACx)
 Initial ADC configuration
  • Maximum current is 700 uA
  • Value to AOUT is 0.

Detailed Description

Contains all functions support for DAC firmware library on LPC17xx.

Contains all functions support for Ethernet MAC firmware library on LPC17xx.
